title: New: GEMS – All I Ever
content:
Since exploding onto the blogosphere with their fantastic debut track Void Moon, Washington DC based duo GEMS have already racked up several thousand plays on their soundcloud, alongside a barrage of praise.

New tune All I Ever pits the minimal vibe of The XX against the sultry, dreamy atmosphere of Beach House, whilst maintaining the pop sensibilities found on Void Moon. With numerous ‘Ones to Watch in 2013’ lists cropping up around this time of year, you’d be naive to not consider GEMS.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
